managers.title: Managers
managers.description: Register a list of QualityManager(s) that should be used to detect and handle data quality issues. Each QualityManager configuration block must consists of a label, a QualityChecker, at least one QualityHandler, and a list of variables that the manager should be applied to.

classname.title: Classname
classname.description: The module path to the Python class that should be used, e.g., if you would write in your script `from tsdat.config.utils.converters import DefaultConverter` then you would put `tsdat.config.utils.converters.DefaultConverter` as the classname.

parameters.title: Parameters
parameters.description: Optional dictionary that will be passed to the Python class specified by 'classname' when it is instantiated. If the object is a tsdat class, then the parameters will typically be made accessible under the `params` property on an instance of the class. See the documentation for individual classes for more information.

classname.title: Classname
classname.description: The module path to the Python class that should be used, e.g., if you would write in your script `from tsdat.config.utils.converters import DefaultConverter` then you would put `tsdat.config.utils.converters.DefaultConverter` as the classname.

parameters.title: Parameters
parameters.description: Optional dictionary that will be passed to the Python class specified by 'classname' when it is instantiated. If the object is a tsdat class, then the parameters will typically be made accessible under the `params` property on an instance of the class. See the documentation for individual classes for more information.

name.title: Name
name.description: A human-readable label that is used to identify this quality manager.

checker.title: Checker
checker.description: Register a class to be used to detect and flag quality issues for the quality handler(s) registered below to handle.

handlers.title: Handlers
handlers.description: Register one or more handlers to take some action given the results of the registered checker. Each handler in this list is defined by a classname (e.g., the python import path to a QualityHandler class), and (optionally) by a parameters dictionary.

apply_to.title: Apply To
apply_to.description: The variables this quality manager should be applied to. Can be "COORDS", "DATA_VARS", or any number of individual variable names.
